table.name: vtiger_pension
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_pension` ( `pensionid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `policynumber` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `relatedclient` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `company` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `startdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `monthly` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_pensioncf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_pensioncf` ( `pensionid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pensionid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
